inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getComponents.

filters.description: Configuration block(s) for filtering. Detailed below.

owner.description: Owner of the image recipes. Valid values are `Self`, `Shared` and `Amazon`. Defaults to `Self`.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getComponents.

arns.description: Set of ARNs of the matched Image Builder Components.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

names.description: Set of names of the matched Image Builder Components.
